title: Jeb:依然在修改生态群系
author: Bruce.Owen
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Bruce.Owen 于 2013-8-7 03:35 编辑 

Jens Bergensten ‏@jeb_
Still working on biomes. This is what the biome overview looks like 
jeb:依然在修改生态群系。
The last couple of days I've been working on improving the world generator for Minecraft (PC). This is the biome overview that I use to see how biomes appear next to each other. #minecraft #mojang




QQ图片20130806151145.jpg (60.5 KB, 下载次数: 2)

下载附件

2013-8-7 03:13 上传





jeb:这几天我一直在完善minecraft的世界生成系统。 这个世界生态分布图被我用来查看相邻的的生态环境之间的产生关系
